title: Error during the build of tock
body:
Hello, I am trying to build tock by `$ ninja -C build-out sw/device/tock/tock`. However it does not get build because of an error.

```
error: failed to run custom build command for `dif v0.1.0 (/home/opentitan/sw/device/tock/dif)`

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `/home/opentitan/build-out/sw/device/tock/release/build/dif-6d394627449483ce/build-script-build` (exit code: 101)
--- stdout
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/meson.build
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/dif_otp_ctrl.h
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/dif_alert_handler.h
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/dif_plic.h
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/dif_rstmgr.h
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/dif_pwrmgr.h
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/dif_warn_unused_result.h
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/dif_gpio.h
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/dif_hmac.h
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/dif_otbn.h
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/dif_usbdev.h
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/dif_i2c.h
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/dif_spi_device.h
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/dif_rv_timer.h
cargo:rerun-if-changed=/home/opentitan/sw/device/lib/dif/dif_uart.h
cargo:warning=couldn't execute `llvm-config --prefix` (error: No such file or directory (os error 2))
cargo:warning=set the LLVM_CONFIG_PATH environment variable to the full path to a valid `llvm-config` executable (including the executable itself)

```

Can you please help?
Thanks in advance.
